I think some of the people leaving bad reviews and talking about how this extension is a scam may have downloaded 'Nonstop 2.0'. That extension has been known to secretly change your search engine to a shady 3rd party site that gathers your data maliciously and tries to infect your computer with malware through dodgy pop ups. Just a heads up. DON'T download Youtube Nonstop 2.0!
Kinda rude that it changes your default search engine to Microsoft :-/

When the tab is in the background the extension does not work at all. This happens because YouTube does not display the prompt while the tab is not visible so the extension cannot click on it. It does its job, but unfortunately conflicts with "Plasma Integration" addon (the default addon on KDE desktops). Specifically: when you play music on youtube, and press "Play" media-key on keyboard for Chrome to pause the music, "youtube-nonstop" enables it back.

Presumably, "youtube-nonstop" uses as a heuristic "whether the tab/browser was focused when youtube stopped playing", and apparently this heuristic alone is not enough.

Excellent & Necessary Extension - when you know the following: 

Extension Name:         YouTube NonStop
Extension Purpose: Controls Youtube  "Video paused. Continue watching?"

Feature Control: 
During YouTube video viewing, YouTube posts a randomly timed on-screen question asking if the viewer is still watching the currently playing video. YouTube will stop the currently playing video, if the viewer does NOT click the "Yes" answer.

Extension Execution:
